materials:
ECC combats all kind of errors in communication systems including interference, noise, synchronization errors, sampling errors. Interference (ICI in OFDMA, MAI in CDMA) cancellation is NOT implemented in real-world systems.

ECC saves power (4-8 times) for given error probability requirement.
